name: PKLabeledValue
desc: An object that can represent a detail about a payment card or other item.

items.name: init(label: String, value: String)
items.desc: Instantiates a new labeled value object with the specified label and value strings.

items.name: var label: String
items.desc: A string that contains the label for the value.

items.name: var value: String
items.desc: A string that contains the value associated with a label.
